# Statistics

> Standard library statistical functions.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var statistics = require( '@stdlib/math/statistics' );
```

#### statistics

Standard library statistical functions.

``` javascript
var stats = statistics;
// returns {...}
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

``` javascript
var getKeys = require( 'object-keys' ).shim();

console.log( getKeys( statistics ) );
```
